content: **general information ** i dedicate the pattern slow down to all mothers and fathers who love care and value every moment spent with their children the pattern is my crochet vision of the song slow down by nichole nordeman https //youtu be/clcnb_euao8 a busy pattern in the center with a flower accent and different textured stitches slows down afterwards representing the time spent with our children since they were born till they grow up the pattern will look gorgeous if you use a few solid colors one solid color self striping with long color changes like mandala sirdar color wheel or sirdar snuggly pattercake or even ombre and long gradient yarn this pattern can create any size square blanket but you could also join squares together creating a stunning king size bed cover now this pattern is available as a free download enjoy the pattern includes detailed written instructions pictures of more complicated rounds a new full video tutorial 2 experience level intermediate language & terminology english us the pattern support questions and answers in facebook group crochet patterns by bebablanket **stitches ** magic_ring single_crochet front post single_crochet back post single_crochet shallow back post single_crochet half_double_crochet back post half_double_crochet double_crochet extended double_crochet front post double_crochet back post double_crochet cluster popcorn puff picot **pattern samples yarn hook size of blanket etc ** yarn caron cakes / strawberry trifle yarn weigh #4 worsted/aran hook size h8 5 mm g 4 mm only for the decoration round sample size 46 rounds = 41 7 106 cm square amount of yarn used for sample 3 68 skeins = 1449 yds 1325 m 736 g 26 oz yarn mandala yarn / wood nymph yarn weigh #3 light/dk hook size 7 4 5 mm e 3 5 mm only for the decoration round sample size 51 round = 37 94 cm square amount of yarn used for sample 2 85 skeins = 1685 3 yds 1541 m 428 g 15 09 oz 1 https //youtu be/fowerhqafgw 2 https //youtu be/fowerhqafgw
